value:
My countrymen have committed
atrocities, and I will not rest until they
pay. On my brother's name, I swear...

Grado, though once poor, made great
strides thanks to its emperor and
generals... Where did it go so wrong?

Hauling cargo, huh? If you need grunt
work done, just leave it to me and my
wyvern friend here.

Interested in my wyvern, are you? His
name's Genarog, and he's good with
people. Just treat him with respect.

I, uh...found this stray kitten. You
know where her parents might be?
She needs to get back home...

I'm Cormag. I've heard high praise of
you from $Nf.
This is the might of a Grado knight!
I won't lose, Brother. No matter what!

If this keeps up, my quest for
vengeance will be over before
it begins...

I'll give you a good show next time
I'm on the field. Consider it my way
of thanking you.

I'm Cormag, a knight of Gra— No...
I'm just another wyvern knight now.
But I know my way around a lance.

Might I ask...what you fight for? What
makes all of the scars worth it to you,
$Nu?$k$pTo repay Emperor Vigarde's grace,
I fought in his name—with pride even.
But now...I find myself lost.$k$pMy brother and I were never the type
to hurt others without reason.$k$pThat's why we vowed to grow strong:
to usher in an age free of conflict. Of
course! THAT is why we fight...$k$pThank you for helping me remember,
my friend. I will redouble my efforts
toward making manifest that dream.
(exertion)
(exertion)
(exertion)
(exertion)
Foes must fall. It's simple.
Your death will be agonizing.
Such foolishness!
You disgust me.
Blast! Not like this...
Hmph...
I'm Cormag. And this wyvern is Genarog. Nice to meet you.
What's that? Er... Not sure what you want, nor what I should say.
For atonement, revenge, entertainment...for power, or for fun... I-I don't know why I fight.
Grado was once a magnificent country. I am not ashamed of the fact that I'm from Grado.
Is there a cleric in the castle? This kitten needs healing!
No matter where I go or what I do, I'm sure my brother would understand.
My brother believed in Princess Eirika. And I will believe in you.
Very well.
Indeed!
It'll be done.
